body:
Comment 14: 
Now, that we have "go tool", users will not require mingw. They should use "standard
Windows" path conventions for GOROOT - "c:\go". For those of us who need to use mingw,
we would have to pick correct GOROOT form as required.

In my view, there is no point persue this issue any further. I am closing it.

Alex
_Status changed to **Unfortunate**._
